catalog_info.title: Themes in Modern Sub-Saharan African History: Proseminar
catalog_info.notes: Open to undergraduates with permission of instructor. Open to undergraduates with permission of instructor.
catalog_info.description: An in-depth study of the major themes in sub-Saharan African history from the mid-19th century to the present, including the scholarship and debates on the changing relationship between Africa and the West.
